ygData.subject: Re: Zardus
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Once again the OOC and BIC simply because Dewboy seems to be into making an ass of himself I guess I shall become a jerk to him for the moment. Dewboy,

OOC: Once again the OOC and BIC simply because Dewboy seems to be 
into making an ass of himself I guess I shall become a jerk to him 
for the moment. Dewboy, when did rhesus land? when did he get here? 
why is he here? Why has noone traded with him but Mustex? Why is he 
so well known yet noone speaks of him? How did Mustex get on the 
island? Why are you insulting yan? Is it because he cares about 
making the RPG fair? Is it because you cant mode like people do in 
DBZ? Is it because he said you cant control a bases shields or 
another persons chars? Is it his, Rauqs, Megans, and Allorans fault 
that they made that rule and must now change it so you can be happy? 
Please answer these questions for me privately. my email is 
legendaryNemasis@....

BIC:

The bamphomet sim thing smirks and soon after wards dissapears as 
everything including blacknightmare breaks up into blocks before all 
is dark once again. Inside the second base, a hatch opens and the pod 
with blacknightmare rises out. Inside of it various devices are 
implanted into her body to make sure she returns.(This has been 
approbed by airly in private mail). A second later the pod rockets up 
and out of the ocean heading to the Oteybis.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> O.k your majesty did it work. And don't forget with someone like 
> Rhesus this one was probably 3x as powerful and 10x as exspensive 
as 
> the original.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > Once again, the last 34 posts were OOCs. Tankor and Kyle, stop 
it, 
> now. Kyle, please explain how Mustex got beyond Alliance shields. 
The 
> only post from you dealing with how he got there was filled with 
> extreme moding, and I didn't see another one. Mustex can't 
magically 
> teleport, so I can't see a logical way that he would be walking 
> around Alliance Island.
> > 
> > And everyone who's been disrespectful to other RPGers, please 
stop. 
> I've deleted all the polls I think are offending, like the "Who's 
the 
> worse RPGer" one. Please don't make any more.
> > 
> > ::Zardus/FZ::
> > 
> > Zardus nods. "Of course."
> > 
> > The shields flash back to full strength, but a section in front 
of 
> Chaostaur fades off, letting him in if he wanted.
> > 
> > "There's a section of the shields open, Orchestra," Zardus says 
> over the comm, "You can enter through that."
> > 
> > "I have some matters to take care of first," he transmits to 
> Frostbite at the same time as sending a transmission to 
Orchestra, "I 
> may be late."
> > 
> > He turns, nodding at Daemos. "Allright. I'll contact him. My 
troops 
> will get themselves to the IGL, but thanks for the offer."
> > 
> > He watches Daemos fly off, making a mental note to send a 
> transmission to this new commander as soon as he was done with 
> Chaostaur.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > FZ looks over Najah. "Very good, Najah. The IGL is starting very 
> soon. You can take a shuttle if you wish."
